content.value:
When your cloud provider sends you email raising the price for your instances by 40% because of IPv4 runout and its increased market price...

...and does not use the opportunity to offer IPv6-only instances for those who don't need V4 any more.
content.html: When your cloud provider sends you email raising the price for your instances by 40% because of IPv4 runout and its increased market price... ...and does not use the opportunity to offer IPv6-only instances for those who don't need V4 any more.
